ActorTalk: Ribbit! Now we just need to sprinkle these dewdrops on the soil where the three-leaf clover seed is buried. Once it's soaked up enough pure emotion, it'll grow into a Miracle Clover!
Froggie already buried the seed! Come on, let's sprinkle the Wish Dewdrops together!
Ribbit! Look! The Miracle Clover is sprouting!
Froggie, if you make a wish on the Miracle Clover, will you finally escape the loop?
Ribbit! That's right! Froggie will finally get to see the sunrise of a brand new day!
Thank you both! Froggie never could've grown the Miracle Clover this fast without your help!
Grandpa Turtle from the library always says sincere wishes bring about miracles! Ribbit, and he was right!
If you ever find yourselves like Froggie, stuck in place, not sure which way to go, remember what I said, ribbit!
A reward would've been nice, though.
